remixlab.dandelion.geom

Class Rot

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.dandelion.geom.Rot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rotation, Copyable

    public class Rot
extends Object
implements Rotation
    A 2D Rotation represented by an angle().

      • fromRotatedBasis

        public void fromRotatedBasis(Vec X,
                    Vec Y,
                    Vec Z)
        Description copied from interface: Rotation
        Sets the rotation from the three rotated vectors of an orthogonal basis.

        The three vectors do not have to be normalized but must be orthogonal and direct (i,e., X^Y=k*Z, with k>0).

        Specified by:
        fromRotatedBasis in interface Rotation
